name: ZenBook Ultra
description: A high-performance laptop suited for work and content creation. Features a beautiful 4K OLED display. However, it lacks a dedicated GPU so it is not suitable for heavy gaming.

name: GamerX Pro
description: A powerful gaming laptop with an RTX 4070, 144Hz refresh rate, and advanced cooling. Built for AAA gaming. Heavy and thick.

name: BudgetBook Basics
description: An entry-level laptop perfect for students, browsing, and basic text editing. Good battery life but very limited storage.

name: SonicBuds Pro
description: Premium true wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation (ANC) and spatial audio. Great for commutes and loud environments.

name: BassHead Over-Ear
description: Wired over-ear headphones with boosted bass. Suitable for home listening and budget studio setups.

name: PixelPhone 15
description: Latest generation smartphone featuring excellent camera quality and a smooth 120Hz display. Good battery but slow charging.

name: ValuePhone Lite
description: A budget-friendly smartphone with a large battery and basic features. Ideal as a backup phone or for kids.

name: ActionCam 360
description: Waterproof action camera capable of 360-degree recording. Perfect for extreme sports and vlogging.
